headline: Maintained Projects
subheadline: The Projects i developed and maintained

creatokia.title: Creatokia
creatokia.description: Creatokia is an NFT Marketplace for digital media. It is developed with Next.js and React. I developed an entire design system based on design specifications.

bookwireOS.title: Bookwire OS
bookwireOS.description: I developed new features in the existent Bookwire OS System with React in Frontend. I transferred the technology to SPA.
